{"id":597147343,"lang":"javascript","lang_name":"JavaScript","time":"1 year, 6 months","timestamp":1638680059,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"110 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/597147343/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Encode and Decode Strings","memory":"45.1 MB","code":"/**\n * Encodes a list of strings to a single string.\n *\n * @param {string[]} strs\n * @return {string}\n */\n\n//https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B1k_sxOSgv8\nvar encode = function(strs) {\n    let result = ''\n    \n    for (let s of strs) {\n        result += +s.length + '#' + s\n    }\n    \n    return result\n    \n};\n\n/**\n * Decodes a single string to a list of strings.\n *\n * @param {string} s\n * @return {string[]}\n */\nvar decode = function(s) {\n    let i = 0, result = []\n    \n    while (i < s.length) {\n        j = i\n        while(s[j] !== '#') {\n            j+=1\n        }\n        let length = +s.substring(i, j) //this portion is the integer\n        result.push(s.substring(j+1, j+1+length))\n        i = j + 1 + length\n    }\n    return result\n    \n};\n\n/**\n * Your functions will be called as such:\n * decode(encode(strs));\n */","compare_result":"","title_slug":"encode-and-decode-strings","has_notes":false}
